Reviews.Title: i really love it,
Reviews.Author: renato ramirez
Reviews.Content: i bought it for the expeed 4, the 39 auto focus points, the 24 mpixels sensor,  the non filter pass, the continue auto focus video, i  the live view bigger screen, i think the gps and wifi, are nice but are only complentaries issues, is very well building, small, not heavy, all my  nikon lenses are compatible, the flash either, mine is grey, i like it, is a very good update nikon camera D5000 D5100 and D5200 series, is better than D3200 and cheaper than D7100, I am really happy with this camera update in four years from my D5000, is very fast, and a lot sharp, i use it wit 55-300mm, and pics are astonishing, the video is realy good, i like the presets on the screen, are better and fast to change them, very good camera, i love nikon!!!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
24.2-megapixel DX-format CMOS image sensor
Built-in Wi-Fi and GPS
3.2-inch swiveling vari-angle LCD
39-point high-density autofocus system
Expeed 4 processor
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5300 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with Nikkor AF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G AF-S DX VR Lens (Grey)
